simplified: 一粒老鼠屎坏了一锅粥

pronunciation.pinyin: yī lì lǎo shǔ shǐ huài le yī guō zhōu
pronunciation.wade_giles_pinyin: yi1 li4 lao3 shu3 shi3 huai4 le5 yi1 guo1 zhou1

details.simplified: 一粒老鼠屎坏了一锅粥
details.traditional: 一粒老鼠屎壞了一鍋粥

meanings.value: lit. a piece of rat feces spoiled the whole pot of congee
fig. one bad apple can spoil the whole bunch
